<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write out the data in &quot;field&quot; order, to be endian-aware.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t TypeRecordFuncId = uint32&#95;t&#123;R.functionId() &amp; ~uint32&#95;t&#123;0x0Fu &lt;&lt; 28&#125;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TypeRecordFuncId &lt;&lt;= 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TypeRecordFuncId |= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(R.recordType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TypeRecordFuncId &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TypeRecordFuncId &amp;= ~uint32&#95;t&#123;0x01&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS.write(TypeRecordFuncId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS.write(R.delta());</span></CodeLine>
